EmailTemplate.subject: Virtualization Webinar: How NII Insourced 1,500 VMs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us for a special webinar hosted by NII and VMTurbo – Best Practices for Smarter Virtualization Management: How NII Insourced 1,500 VMs across 5 datacenters (http://bit.ly/1b2h1As)
Telecom company NII Holdings (operating under the Nextel brand in Argentina, Brazil, Mexico and Chile) manages independent datacenters in each of its operating markets, and recently decided to insource all of its IT operations from a management partner.
Larry Rouse, the Sr. Director of IT who was responsible for Transformation will join VMTurbo to discuss the challenges they faced. Topics discussed will include:
- Specific challenges & risk management of insourcing IT ops from a partner - How NII uses VMTurbo to better protect IT ops from performance issues - The performance challenges NII faced with virtualization - How NII manages capacity more efficiently with VMTurbo - How NII uses VMTurbo to plan for future growth to maximize utlization and reduce IT hardware spend
Webinar Details:
- Title: Best Practices for Smarter Virtualization Management: How NII Insourced 1,500 VMs across 5 datacenters (http://bit.ly/1b2h1As) - Date: January 22, 2014 - Time: 2pm ET/ 11am PT
We hope you can join us.
VMTurbo
